snippet.title: Mops & Mobs: A Sweeping Dungeon Novel - Demo Teaser
snippet.description:
Welcome to your new job! As the dungeon's janitor you take care of our monsters' well-being, pick up adventurers' left-over limbs, and find ways to let our beloved Dungeon Master look more competent.

Mops & Mobs is currently a demo/prototype for a Dungeon Novel. We plan to make a full game out of it,  so here's a Steam page to wishlist!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2851050/Mops__Mobs_A_Sweeping_Dungeon_Novel/

Also if you want you can give us feedback after testing the game for free on itch: https://ratking.itch.io/mops-and-mobs
